title: Wetland destruction - effects on a river

content.prompt: Which of the following is most likely to result from destruction of wetlands surrounding a river?

choices.label: A decreased sediment load in the river
A decreased level of pollutants such as nitrates in the river
An increased diversity of aquatic species in the river
An increased level of oxygen in the river
An increased frequency of flooding of the river valley

topic.text: 8.4: Human Impacts on Wetlands and Mangroves
